Description:
Private, Quiet and Ready for You to Buy it!
Located in a quiet court, this private three bedroom double-brick home has all the bells and whistles for the first home buyer or the astute investor.
Timber paneling & brickwork are a feature in the spacious living area with exposed beams, split system air conditioning & mains gas wall heater.
Step into the expansive dining room and kitchen area. Polished tiles, laminate benchtops, gas cooktop & oven, offering plenty of cupboard space for pots, pans or anything else you may need.
Comprising 3 bedrooms plus a study. All bedrooms have built in robes & each is climate controlled by their own split system air-conditioner. Master bedroom with direct access to the updated bathroom.
A terrific backyard set on a large 599 sqm (approx) allotment.
Insights: 4 Ningana Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
The Great Escape
There is a certain charm only found in weather board houses, a warmth of a loved family home with a gaslog fireplace to high vaulted timber ceilings. This house is a home with a special ambience.
Getaway from it all & enjoy your own idyllic world. A commanding entertainment balcony overlooks your private backyard.
A secluded side entry is a doorknockers nightmare, while the split level design separates the three upper level bedrooms from the main living level.
Stepping down to the main living room as it opens up to the modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances including a 900 mm oven & double fridge cavity. White sleek lines, composite stone bench tops & a window looking out to the balcony makes this kitchen a joy to entertain.
Step out onto the modern full length balcony & get down to some serious entertaining or take the time to relax.
The lower level is ideally suited for co-habitation if you require; with a living / rumpus room with external access to a paved undercover entertaining area; a large master bedroom with ensuite.
A secluded backyard with ample lawn & well designed garden beds, there is even room for a chookpen.
All the focus of this home is on whats hidden, not the street.
A large 4 x 8 metre shed with easy street access complements the ample hardstanding for parking out front, you'll never be short of car, boat & guest parking.
Insights: 33 Whitcombes Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
The height of Clifton Springs quality lifestyle and location
Tucked away in a quiet cul-de-sac, and located on one of the high points of picturesque Clifton Springs, this impeccably-presented contemporary family home offers a delightful lifestyle - with some wonderful bay views as a bonus.
An elevated drive leads to a double lock-up garage, while a curving path bordered by a spectacular row of standard lilly-pilly trees and colourful carnations delivers you to the covered porch. At the front of the house, the master bedroom enjoys glimpses of the bay, plus a generous walk-through dressing room, and a sparkling ensuite with a separate WC.
The open-plan kitchen/lounge/dining area is an entertainer's dream, with double sliding doors accessing a north-east facing deck - the perfect spot for drinks, barbecues, or just lazing about. And the skillfully terraced garden provides an absolutely stunning backdrop to whatever alfresco activity you choose.
The galley-style kitchen offers a large Westinghouse electric oven with a 5-burner gas cooktop, an Asko dishwasher, and a large walk-in pantry connects to the compact laundry. A second entertainment/rumpus room sits adjacent to three more bedrooms, and the main bathroom offers a shower, bath and vanity, plus a separate WC. Ducted heating and cooling throughout the home ensure year-round comfort. Behind double gates at the front there's also room for a boat, trailer, or extra vehicle storage.
- Impeccably-presented family home and garden with bay views
- Ideal elevated location in quiet cul-de-sac with lock-up garage
- Master bedroom with ensuite, 3 more bedrooms, and bathroom
- Open-plan kitchen/lounge/dining to excellent deck and garden
- Second entertainment/rumpus room, walk-in pantry, and laundry
- Ceiling ducted heating and cooling throughout.
Insights: 18 Gange Place, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 67 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Prime Time on Bay Shore
Positioned on a generous 586m2 block, fully enclosed by a secure wrap-around fence and double gates this immaculately presented home will exceed all expectations.
Comprising 3 bedrooms all with built - in robes, the master bedrooms includes an ensuite with double shower and ceiling fan. A large light filled first living area including ceiling fan is situated at the fore of the home along with the master bedroom.
This free-flowing floor plan opens into a large open plan kitchen, meals and 2nd living area. The kitchen includes gas cooking, soft closing drawers, Bosch dishwasher and glass splash back with plenty of bench space. The main bathroom including bath and shower and separate toilet service the remaining bedrooms, the generous laundry including storage and access to the garden complete this astute floor plan.
With not a blade of grass out of place the manicured front and back gardens will certainly appeal. An undercover alfresco area with steps up to an elevated garden enjoying subtle views of the Bay. Established fruit trees and lush garden beds including a garden shed.
Features of this well- appointed home include ducted heating, split system cooling, plenty of storage, ceiling fans single - lock up carport and 5KW solar panels. The recent refurb on the property means that you can move straight in and enjoy the Peninsula lifestyle.
Located in a prime Clifton Springs pocket with the Clifton Springs Golf Club across the way, The Dell, bowling club and the Bay at the end of the street. Plenty of bus stops and an easy walk into the Drysdale Township. An ideal first home, downzisers retreat, investment opportunity or a lavish weekender this home caters for all.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Traditional Bayside Entertainer
The Feel:
Sprawled across a sensational 1469m2 approx. allotment at the end of a quiet court, this traditional 4 bedroom home is fully equipped for your family to embrace a beautiful bayside lifestyle. Boasting low maintenance properties with the extreme comforts of home, perfect orientation infuses the home with natural light, offering seamless connection to the
lush garden and outdoor entertainment spaces to the rear. Truly ready to be enjoyed, there is no time like the present.
The Facts:
- OP living, dining and kitchen with alfresco access
- Privatised second lounge for peace and relaxation
- Bright kitchen with stone tops and european ss apps
- A meals and private dining room gift dual options
- Sensational undercover alfresco area for entertaining
- Above ground swimming pool, perfect for summer fun
- An abundance of free space for children to play
- Beautifully landscaped gardens shroud the home in colour
- Indulgent master suite with WIR and large ensuite
- 3 additional BRs enjoy sunny orientation and natural light
- Well built and presented in immaculate condition
- DLUG with additional SLUG with remote for vehicle overflow
- Plus provision for boat, trailer or caravan parking
- Fantastically located to enjoy the best of the Bellarine
- Close by to bayside beaches and all practical facilities
The Owner Loves....
we love the secluded position, sitting high at the end of the court, the property is peaceful and private, we each have our own preferred nooks to retreat to in the garden. The home is comfortable all year round with abundant natural light and cooling sea breezes. A modern open plan design with good zoning has made this home a much beloved holiday home for our extended family

Description:
Perfect Private Oasis!
Behind its pristine façade and captivating landscaped gardens, 14 Narawi Avenue is truly an impressive family home which has that "wow factor" written all over it. Superbly situated in one of Clifton Springs most coveted pockets, the home is set on a 626sqm(approx.) allotment and offers the astute buyer the ability to utilise the properties full potential to be able to have off street parking for a boat or a caravan with ease. Upon entering the home you are greeted with a welcoming hallway featuring beautiful timber floors which enhances the significant open plan design allowing the home to flow seamlessly from room to room. Boasting two separate living areas and a study the options for relaxing are endless. Featuring 3 bedrooms, with the master bedroom having the luxury of a walk in robe and ensuite, the home offers flexible accommodation options. Showcasing the inside of the home is the sophisticated kitchen which oozes instant appeal while being practical and functional at the same time. Outside presents the same high level of quality offering plenty of space for relaxing and entertaining in style, highlighted by landscaped gardens providing supreme privacy. Comprehensively appointed throughout this fine family home includes an abundance of storage, separate laundry with side access, a garden shed, a split system air conditioner for cooling and gas ducted heating. This superbly presented family home is located close to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for. Only a short stroll to public transport, an excellent array of the area's finest schools, public or private & access to the Bellarine Peninsulas world class restaurants & wineries - all of which enhances the lifestyle appeal of this prestigious location. An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this beautiful home.
Insights: 14 Narawi Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 64 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
BLOCK WITH OPTIONS
No 64 Beacon Point Rd is one of the few vacant blocks with potential for views in this pocket of Clifton Springs. With the added bonus of a solid 13m x 6m shed with concrete flooring there will be plenty of storage space whilst you build.
Currently part workshop with roller doors at the front and part lined studio at the rear there are possibilities aplenty for this block of land.
There is also the option to purchase no 66 and have a total land area of approximately 1313m2

Address: 66 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
GREAT PROPERTY! GREAT PRICE!
Located in sought after Clifton Springs just a leisurely stroll to the waters edge, with the local milk bar round the corner and public transport close by. This property is central to all attractions and amenities the Bellarine has to offer.
On entry the home is open and spacious. This is a home with individual style - spacious rooms, over height doors and soaring ceilings in the living room and master bedroom. Massive floor to ceiling windows maximise light and aspect. Freshly painted walls throughout and with the kitchen already modernised it will be a matter of adding individual touches to your new home.
Views of Corio Bay and surrounds can be captured from the kitchen, living and master bedroom.
The master suite is spacious as are two minor bedrooms with ample storage in each.
Reverse cycle cooling and central gas heating are supplemented by a character gas log fire in the lounge area.
The double garage has internal access to the home and a storeroom to the rear.
Inspection is a must to appreciate this very individual character home.
There is the opportunity to also purchase the adjacent, vacant block of land with established garage. (615m2)

Address: 13-17 High Ridge Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Peace, Privacy & Rare Bay Views
The Feel:
Privately set beyond a mature tree line and enjoying a coveted Clifton Springs address, is a unique buying opportunity combining the privilege of space, with stunning water views across Corio Bay.
The updated 3BR residence boasts a social open plan design thats loaded with potential, with a comfortable and relaxed coastal vibe that comes from living this close to the waters edge.
The Facts:
-Updated 3BR+study single level home set across 3.3 acres approx.
-Bright interiors feature polished concrete flooring and raked ceilings
-Central country kitchen with dw, electric wall oven and induction cooktop
-Lounge with automatic Velux window and cosy gas log fireplace
-Living zone with timber sliding doors accessing an expansive lawn and deck
-Elevated viewing deck offers a peaceful setting to enjoy further views
-Expansive north facing grassed area perfect for children, and horse riding
-Direct access to Beacon Point Reserve, with steps down to the water!
-Enclosed salt-chlorinated in-ground swimming pool with solar heating
-Master BR with WIR and modern ensuite, with access to study/nursery
-BR 2 with access to family bathroom and BR 3 with spacious ensuite
-Passive design captures winter sun and coastal breeze, with SSAC and fans
-DLUG with rear roller-door, fitted shelves and plumbing ideal as a workshop
-2 paddocks with stables, long driveway with dual access ideal for floats/trailers
-Orchard, raised vegie beds and chook pen for a semi self-sufficient lifestyle
-Central Bellarine Peninsula location close to schools, Geelong and Docklands ferry
-Minutes to award-winning wineries, surf beaches, and coastal towns
The Owner Loves.
The open floor space is great for parties, and the sunsets across the Bay are beautiful. We love being steps away from the water, its such a quiet spot and modern conveniences are just up the road!

Address: 10 Sea Haven Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Find Your Haven
Looking directly out onto the neat landscaped front garden, the master suite features a very generous walk in robe and perfectly proportioned ensuite complete with shower, vanity and toilet.
The formal lounge room in the middle of the home separates the main bedroom from the rest of the house, offering a space that could be used for the younger members of the family to enjoy their favourite shows or a retreat for mum and dad. The formal dining room is currently used as a study.
The open plan kitchen, with an Electrolux dishwasher, Simpson stovetop and rangehood for the chef, complementing the spacious dining and lounge areas. Brand new carpet and polished floorboards throughout finish these areas off marvellously, with ducted heating and split system air conditioning to keep the house warm in Winter and cool in Summer.
A central bathroom services two more bedrooms, both with built in robes and more than enough room for the rest of the family.
A covered outdoor area provides space for a barbecue or outdoor setting under shade from the elements, with more room for family and friends to enjoy in the backyard.
A garden shed, double garage and prime position within walking distance to parkland, schools and shops make this home an absolute winner.
Insights: 10 Sea Haven Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Clifton Springs Charm
This delightful residence boasts one of the warmest, welcoming 'feels' imaginable! An attractive street appeal creates an anticipation for what is sure to be a memorable inspection.
All the modern comforts, beautifully light and bright, modernised kitchen/bathrooms, wonderfully expansive brick paved alfresco provides a wonderful vantage point to admire a 'pretty as a picture' garden setting and a garage/workshop (complete with remote control). If you desire the ultimate 'turnkey', 'nothing to do' and 'enjoy from day one' prospect this home has your name on it!
Three bedrooms; master complete with modernised ensuite and walk in robe
A beautifully appointed kitchen, contemporary appliances, custom cabinetry, expansive bench space and excellent storage solutions
A wonderfully light and bright primary living area; huge north facing window promotes an abundance of natural light an inviting space to take in a cup of tea and soak up the warmth from the morning sun
All the modern comforts; ducted heating/cooling, new carpets, freshly painted. Slate floors, timber decking, exposed aggregate drive-way and external blinds just to name a few of the fine inclusions
A prime land holding of 585m2 (approx) within a tranquil green leafy pocket of Clifton Springs completes a very pretty picture
As delightful as this home is, I personally believe that its impressive surrounds sets it apart from others in the market place; mature trees flank the boundaries creating a welcomed seclusion, productive veggie patches and selection of fruits trees, a family/pet friendly secure rear yard, rain water tanks, brick paved sheltered alfresco and an expansive garage and defined work shop.
Insights: 16 Barringup Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 75 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Country Club Updated Classic
Lots to love with the versatility on offer here! This updated property is just right for you as your very first family home, perfect downsizer or an addition to your current investment portfolio. 1st living area is the lounge with a natural gas simulated log fire place. New kitchen has brand new stainless steel appliances including a 700mm & 5 burner gas upright cooker, Dishlex dishwasher, laminate bench tops & additional storage with the push open cupboards under the island bench. The dining area has sliding doors for easy access to the backyard. Down the hall are the 3 bedrooms of which 2 have built in robes. Central large bathroom offers you good bench space plus storage with a separate shower room. Generous laundry also offers a great space for extra storage. A 2nd living area is on offer or could even be a larger 4th bedroom, the choice is yours which has external access perfect for even a home office. Loaded with additional features such as:-
• Freshly painted throughout
• New door fittings
• New tap fittings
• Electric hot water service
• Concrete stumps
• 2 reverse cycle split system
• New floor coverings
• New window furnishings
• Rewired switchboard with new safety switches
• Exhaust Fans
• Oyster LED light fittings
• Front door sensor light
All sitting pretty on a 603m2 block with a single carport, double car garage & a gravel parking bay at the front which will accommodate a 20ft caravan or boat. A must on your inspection list!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Address: 3 Corio Bay Court Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Outstanding home with panoramic bay views
This is Clifton Springs at its spectacular best. A very appealing contemporary family home and established garden, set on an acre of land, and with priceless panoramic views of Corio Bay.
A semi-circular drive delivers you to the covered entrance where you're greeted by the first of two master bedrooms - complete with walk-in robe and smart ensuite. Adjacent is a cosy study or home office. Next is a light-filled lounge with a raked ceiling, an open gas log fire, and those special views through a double-glazed wall of windows. In parallel are two more bedrooms, a bathroom, a laundry and a separate WC.
A superb open-plan kitchen/dining/lounge with a high-gabled ceiling is the central living space. Double glass doors open from the lounge to a covered paved terrace that takes advantage of the brilliant bay vista. The kitchen presents Caesarstone benchtops, Bosch appliances, and generous cupboards, while the intimate dining alcove has views on three sides.
Stairs lead to the prized second master bedroom, with a sparkling ensuite and a private balcony. Other features include a double lock-up garage, a second entertainment terrace, and a large lawn area with the potential for a separate B&B, or granny flat (STCA). Ducted gas heating and two split systems provide year-round comfort.
- Contemporary home and garden with spectacular bay views
- 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 2 lounges, kitchen, dining, study
- 2 master BRs with ensuites - upstairs has private balcony
- Kitchen with Caesarstone benches and Bosch appliances
- Double lock-up garage, ducted heating, two split systems
- Potential for B&B or granny flat on lawn area (STCA).
Insights: 3 Corio Bay Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Views for less than 1/2 a million dollars
Imagine sitting at the dining table with your morning cuppa enjoying the views of Corio Bay & the City of Geelong. A stunning front rose garden in full bloom enhances the street appeal of this neat & tidy home. This three bedroom family home would make an ideal start for the first homebuyer or investor.
Formal entry opening up to a spacious separate lounge with large light filled windows.
Kitchen with U-shaped bench & dining room with amazing bay views towards Geelong.
All three bedrooms are of a comfortable size.
Central bathroom with bath, separate shower & vanity.
A wide driveway with a high carport allows easy access to the yard.
A large stand alone double garage a the rear of the property would ideally suit a boat & a caravan.
A delightful raised backyard has plenty of lawn for a dog & the children to play.
End the day watching the sun set over Corio Bay with a glass of wine as the lights of Geelong start to twinkle.

Description:
A rare opportunity.
Clifton Springs can only be described as the best valued suburb along the whole of the Bellarine Peninsula. This market is the best chance you will have to secure a wonderful well priced home close to some of the best beaches in Australia. It is well suited for investors, first home buyers and home owners.
Upon entry into this beautiful home you are greeted by the original timber floors that run throughout the living area and a wood fire heater. The kitchen and dining area complement each other well making entertaining a breeze, featuring a built in pantry, gas stove top and electric oven. The property also has 3 well sized bedrooms with the main featuring a walk in robe and an entrance into the bathroom which includes a bath and large single vanity.
Stepping outside you realise how large the block is, totalling 592m2 (approx.), making it the perfect environment for the kids to play or for the dog to run around in. The garage and carport each hold a car space helping you keep your vehicles out of the weather.
The location cannot be beat, Clifton Springs Golf Club, Drysdale Shopping Centre are only a short drive away and with Ocean Grove 15 minutes away trips to the beach will become a common occurrence.
Don't miss out on purchasing in the ever growing Clifton Springs, value for money will not last forever.
Insights: 52 Panpandi Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
NEAT, SWEET, COMPLETE
Looking for the complete package in a great neighborhood then look no further than this immaculately maintained, established home in central Clifton Springs. Everything you could ask for in this neat package ! A great floor plan and a massive, north-facing outdoor entertaining area suited for use all year round. Easy to maintain with ample parking, plenty of storage options and a compact productive garden. There's nothing that requires work here !
Three bedrooms with modern ensuite and bathroom, lounge and family/dining area adjacent to the updated kitchen. The outdoor entertaining deck adds another dimension to the family's enjoyment all year round. Floor coverings have been updated and the central heating unit and instantaneous gas HWS are almost new. Lofty cathedral ceilings give rooms a light and spacious feel.
Solar panels add to the efficiency of the home and there's even a bit of a view from the front veranda ! Centrally located to Geelong and the Bellarine Peninsula inspect now.

Description:
HOME TO RELAX IN
The current owners of this home built it to suit their lifestyle and to enjoy the view. They are ready now to let someone else enjoy. The gardens are well established and complete with drip system, this means the water ends up going straight to the roots and the result speaks for itself. Low maintenance means more time to play golf, go fishing, visit the local cafes and restaurants and even escape north for the winter.
The home has a 'come and relax' feel to it, and with its open plan many people can be in the one space enjoying each other's company.
Comprising two separate living areas, three generous bedrooms, open plan kitchen. There is side access for anyone who wants to park their caravan, trailer or boat. With the choice of two separate outdoor undercover spots no matter the weather you can still experience the fresh air daily.
The Bellarine Peninsula offers so many things to work, live and play. Such as walking tracks, sporting groups, dance groups, schools, medical centres, shopping complexes and public transport. Not to mention the restaurants, cafes etc. Many people are enjoying travelling to work on the ferry from Portarlington to Docklands, too many things to list.
Best you come on a road trip and see for yourself. Then you can book a time to view and see how it might work for your lifestyle?
Insights: 40 Narawi Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Private north facing backyard with bay views
Privacy, charm and tranquillity are words that come to mind when stepping inside this family home. Inspecting this home is a must, as soon as you step inside the front door you realise the potential this property has to offer. The central living area has exposed beams that separates the master suite from the rest of the home.
The large master bedroom impresses with wall to floor mirrored built in robes. A freestanding vanity complements a very generous en-suite that has it's own exterior access into the large north facing garden.
Kitchen features include a five burner gas stove, dishwasher, breakfast bar, bay views and an enormous walk in pantry. The size and open plan aspect of the dining and family area allow for an arrangement of furniture layouts. You can relax in front of the gaslog fire and enjoy the views of the garden through the wide north facing windows.
The second and third bedrooms are serviced by a central bathroom and laundry that includes toilet, vanity and shower.
A large covered outdoor area suitable for summer entertaining is only one small element of this enormous private backyard. Garden boxes and fruit trees pepper the yard, with plenty of space for the family and the dog to run around.
This house is conveniently located in an established area within easy walking distance to the bayside beaches and nearby parklands. Clifton Springs Primary School and the new local playground are only minutes away by foot. Curlewis shopping centre is just a short drive away and further afield are the fabulous attractions of the Bellarine.
Features include
- A lock-up garage
- Three water tanks
- Separate parking in the front yard
- Solar gas boosted hot water
- Under-floor heating throughout the property
- An impressive 23.5 meter frontage

Description:
BRIGHT FAMILY HOME & ROOM FOR THE BOAT!
Situated in a quiet cul de sac in Clifton Springs on a 558m2 parcel of land with both Drysdale and Curlewis shopping hubs in close proximity is this fabulous home barely a year old with wonderful potential to be further enhanced by adding your own personal touches! Featuring ducted heating throughout the home, 4 generous bedrooms including Master with WIR and ensuite, a fantastic kitchen with WIP, open plan dining and living area with ceiling fans and split system plus direct access to both the side and rear gardens allowing for an abundance of light & making the most of an indoor/outdoor lifestyle.There is ample storage space with double car accommodation plus side access for storage of a boat or caravan. This is the ideal home for those looking to enjoy the Bellarine lifestyle with pristine beaches and award winning wineries just down the road!

Address: 132 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Cosy Weekend Retreat and so affordable !
There is a special feel here with this delightful 3 bedroom timber cottage. Light and bright throughout, the kitchen combines with meals, separate lounge room and three generous bedrooms, two with BIR'S, central bathroom, and laundry. Features include gas log heater, split system air conditioner, polished timber floors, period features, washing machine, new fences and plenty of storage. The rear decking provides for outdoor entertaining. Off road parking for 2 vehicles and room to add carport STCA. Land size 442m2. A low maintenance getaway to enjoy the bay and wineries.

Description:
BE SURPRISED BEHIND THE LEAFY FACADE!
Interesting and appealing architecture, built to take advantage of the tree lined reserve, set on APP., 790 SQM of land. A generous entrance opens to the large formal lounge with separate dining, a peaceful and quiet outlook, second living has excellent kitchen with space for meals and/or living. The hallway flows to extra generous master bedroom with ensuite and WIR, remaining two have BIR'S, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Downstairs rumpus room or den provides another living (maybe home office, has direct internal access as well). Features woodfire box, timber beamed ceilings, granite benches, walk in pantry, split system, fans and more. Double garage, wide front verandah, garden shed and easterly back deck. Inspect and appreciate all that is here, middle of the village but... a bush haven.
